metadata.description: A Lightweight Dynamic MVVM View Model(.net4 & silverlight4 & silverlight5). Removes boilerplate code for MVVM, makes it practical to use MVVM in all size apps. IOC supported using NInject, TinyIOC, Unity or MEF.
metadata.tags: MVVM dynamic .net40 Silverlight wpf impromptu interface unity mef ninject tinyioc
